slides.title: Constitution
slides.content:
**Adopted:** 26 Jan 1950 (Republic Day)
**Type:** Federal, Parliamentary
**Features:** Fundamental Rights, Duties
**Three Pillars:** Legislature, Executive, Judiciary

slides.title: Government Structure
slides.content:
**President:** Head of State
**Prime Minister:** Head of Government
**Parliament:** Lok Sabha (Lower) + Rajya Sabha (Upper)
**Supreme Court:** Highest judicial authority
